snippet: Barry Tootell, chief executive of the British lender Co-Operative Banking Group, resigned on Friday, less than a month after the firm failed to acquire part of the branch network of a local rival, Lloyds Banking Group.
abstract: Barry Tootell, chief executive of the British lender Co-Operative Banking Group, resigned on Friday, less than a month after the firm failed to acquire part of the branch network of a local rival, Lloyds Banking Group.

headline.print_headline: Head Of British Co-Operative Banking Group Resigns
